pr_title: DB-8256 allow nestedloop join condition to be pushed down to derived table

timeline.bodyText: Nitpick: can you end the name in *IT to follow the convention?
timeline.author: dgomezferro

timeline.message: DB-8256 allow nestedloop join condition to be pushed down to derived table
DB-8256 do not push nestedloop join predicate down below window functions
